title: mAP for original YOLOv3 repo
body:
Hi,

I am using the YOLO sources from: [Joseph  Redmon github](https://github.com/pjreddie/darknet).
If I run the command:
`./darknet detector valid cfg/voc.data cfg/yolov3-tiny-voc.cfg yolov3-tiny-voc.weight`
This generates files like:

> comp4_det_test_aeroplane.txt  comp4_det_test_bottle.txt  comp4_det_test_chair.txt        comp4_det_test_horse.txt        comp4_det_test_sheep.txt
comp4_det_test_bicycle.txt    comp4_det_test_bus.txt     comp4_det_test_cow.txt          comp4_det_test_motorbike.txt    comp4_det_test_sofa.txt
comp4_det_test_bird.txt       comp4_det_test_car.txt     comp4_det_test_diningtable.txt  comp4_det_test_person.txt       comp4_det_test_train.txt
comp4_det_test_boat.txt       comp4_det_test_cat.txt     comp4_det_test_dog.txt          comp4_det_test_pottedplant.txt  comp4_det_test_tvmonitor.txt

How do I convert these files to something suitable the mAP tool. Is there a tool already available to parse these.

Each file is of the form:

> 000010 0.005233 61.189667 63.974548 309.445068 433.847534
> 000067 0.905197 17.301270 98.636368 455.334564 201.965469
> 000111 0.005037 96.461426 197.848450 153.418335 227.003723

ImageID Confidence x y w h
